scripts.prebuild: npm run installBcryptTypes && npm run installMissingTypes && npm run installMissingDeclaration
scripts.installBcryptTypes: npm list --depth=0 --json | jq '.dependencies["@types/bcrypt"]' | grep -qE '"version": ".*"' && echo 'Bcrypt types already installed' || npm install --save-dev @types/bcrypt
scripts.installMissingTypes: npm list --depth=0 --json | jq 'del(.dependencies["@types/bcrypt"])' | jq 'del(.dependencies["@types/mocha"])' | jq 'del(.dependencies["@types/jsonwebtoken"])' | grep -qE '"version": ".*"' && echo 'All types installed' || npm install --save-dev @types/mocha @types/jsonwebtoken
scripts.installMissingDeclaration: test -f ./bcrypt.d.ts && echo 'Bcrypt declaration file exists' || echo 'declare module "bcrypt";' > ./bcrypt.d.ts
